name: Crystal Town
description:
Hey for Ludum Dare 49 Theme: Unstable

This is our first game ever made ♥ 

We didn't have any experience, so this is our best we could do!

We had so much fun creating this game in this time! ♥

It is a top down collecting Pixel Art Game!

I (Lucy Lu) did all the Game Art myself... every tile, every sprite and every animation... it isn't much but for the first tim I'm really happy how it turned out. 

I'm so thankful for my boyfriend joinig this event with me ♥ 

I can't code and seeing my game ideas coming to life is such a nice feeling I'm crying happy tears.

Thank you so much Simon, I love you! ♥

We had so much more planned, but you know 72 hours isn't much...

We are so proud creating this game!

Thank you for playing our first game, Hope you enjoy it! Please rate and give feedback. We would love to improve ourselfves!

You can find us on Instagram: @x.lucy.lu & @simon_der_fels

Audio was used from freesounds.org

cabled_mess - Music: Little Happy Tune

InspectorJ - Sound: Footsteps, Stones/ Book, Flipping Through Pages

NenadSimic - Menu Selection Click
